title: Hotel Item
description: A hotel or lodging property within a hotel-type catalog. Carries the property data that platforms use for hotel ads, dynamic remarketing, and travel campaign creatives. Maps to Google Hotel Center feeds, Meta hotel catalogs, and similar platform-native formats.

hotel_id.description: Unique identifier for this property. Used to match remarketing events and inventory feeds to the correct hotel.

name.description: Property name (e.g., 'Grand Hotel Amsterdam', 'Seaside Resort & Spa').

description.description: Property description highlighting features and location.

address.description: Structured address for display and geocoding.

price.description: Nightly rate or starting price. Use period 'night' for nightly rates.

url.description: Property landing page or booking URL.

phone.description: Property phone number in E.164 format.

check_in_time.description: Standard check-in time in HH:MM format (e.g., '15:00').

check_out_time.description: Standard check-out time in HH:MM format (e.g., '11:00').

valid_from.description: Date from which this item is available or this rate applies (ISO 8601, e.g., '2025-03-01'). Used for seasonal availability windows in feed imports.

valid_to.description: Date until which this item is available or this rate applies (ISO 8601, e.g., '2025-09-30'). Used for seasonal availability windows in feed imports.

assets.description: Typed creative asset pools for this hotel. Uses the same OfferingAssetGroup structure as offering-type catalogs. Standard group IDs: 'images_landscape' (16:9 hero images), 'images_vertical' (9:16 for Snap, Stories), 'images_square' (1:1), 'logo'. Enables formats to declare typed image requirements that map unambiguously to the right asset regardless of platform.

data.name: Grand Hotel Amsterdam
data.description: Five-star canal-side hotel in the heart of Amsterdam with rooftop bar and spa.
